value.name: Cindy Crawford Posts Throwback Photo with Princess Diana Following Cameo in “The Crown”
value.description: On Aug. 31, 1997, Diana and her boyfriend, Dodi Fayed, were traveling by car in Paris with a driver and bodyguard pursued by paparazzi when their vehicle slammed into a support column of a tunnel, flipped and came to a rest in front of oncoming traffic. Dodi and the driver died instantly while Diana died later in the hospital. She was 36 years old.

video.name: Cindy Crawford Posts Throwback Photo with Princess Diana Following Cameo in “The Crown”

value.name: The Crown's Dominic West says he 'understands' criticism and 'discomfort' around the Netflix show - and 'thought a lot about that' before taking on the role of Charles
value.description: Prince of Wales on The Crown - told BBC 5 Live that he had 'thought a lot' about the discomfort around events it was portraying.

value.description: The ninth edition of London’s Focus, the production sector event, attracted a record number of attendees this year. More than 3,500 delegates, exhibitors and sponsors from 84 countries attended the event,

value.name: Former royal chef explains unusual dinner rule for William and Kate’s children
value.description: Former royal chef Darren McGrady, who worked for both the late Queen Elizabeth II and Princess Diana, told Harper’s Bazaar that the royal children cannot eat with their parents at official dinners or during holidays. The chef revealed that the rule stems from the importance of learning “polite conversation”, the Mirror reports.

value.name: The world’s best hotels for 2024 have been named – and six are in the UK
value.description: That’s because six UK hotels were included in Condé Nast Traveller’s 2024 ‘ Gold List ’, which names all of the most glamorous hotels across the world for holidaymakers to shortlist. There are 68 bougie resorts and hotels on the full list, divided into continents, but these are the six that are very close to home.

value.name: Prince Harry's book 'didn't sell anywhere near enough to warrant his huge payday'
value.description: Prince Harry 's tell-all book Spare reportedly didn't sell as many copies as originally hoped, with one royal commentator stating that the lack of copies sold did not "warrant his huge payday". value.description: Dr Evan Harris, former Director of Hacked Off and now a legal analyst to the successful claimants against Mirror Group Newspapers over phone hacking and other unlawful information gathering, deconstructs former Daily Mirror editor Piers Morgan’s statement on the damning judgement against the firm last week.

value.name: Meghan Markle just made a surprise return to acting
value.description: Meghan Markle confirmed her retirement from acting when she announced her engagement to Prince Harry in 2017. While she had enjoyed a successful career in Hollywood, most notably starring in the popular legal drama Suits for seven seasons, Meghan said she ...

value.name: Did You Catch the Hidden Message In Prince Harry and Meghan Markle’s Holiday Card?
value.description: But there’s a detail of the Sussex holiday card you may have missed, a body language expert told The Daily Express. Darren Stanton believes that, while the card may look more “corporate,” that Harry and Meghan are subtly communicating their happiness to the public. (In the photo, both beam widely.)
